title: Awww!
author: JGray
text:
I cannot get over how adorable Mandrake is on this page! Gennifer did a fantastic job with her! The outfit is somewhat 80s inspired, I admit.

In the extras section you can now find a link to Mysteries of the Arcana's first fanfiction! A while back Ayshara was kind enough to write a MotA inspired drabble. It took me a while but I finally linked to it. It is front and center, first thing, when you click on the extras button.

See you at the end of the week!
